Episodes.Title: Tanaka-kun and Ohta-kun
Episodes.Actors: Kenshô Ono, Yoshimasa Hosoya, Kotori Koiwai
Episodes.Plot: A high school boy Tanaka is easy-going and lethargic, and loves to live calm and quiet life. His close friend Ohta is a reliable boy, and gives him some good advices or takes care of him depending on the situation. One day, Tanaka...

Episodes.Title: Tanaka-kun's Summer
Episodes.Actors: Kenshô Ono, Yoshimasa Hosoya, Natsumi Takamori
Episodes.Plot: One summer day, Tanaka and Ohta go to a pool. Tanaka cannot swim well, but he has his way of relaxing at a pool. / Miyano wants to wear a Yukata (a casual Kimono for summer) for adult women at fireworks display when it'll be held ...

Episodes.Title: Tanaka-kun's Happiness
Episodes.Actors: Kenshô Ono, Yoshimasa Hosoya, Natsumi Takamori
Episodes.Plot: Shiraishi is fascinated by Tanaka. She wants to know him more, but it's difficult for her to talk to him because almost always he sleeps or he is on another planet.
